name: excel-content-add-in-data-visualization
title: Create an Excel data-visualization content add-in
shortDescription: Create an Excel content add-in that includes data visualization.
longDescription: Learn how to build an Office content add-in that includes data visualization in an Excel workbook.

thumbnails.alt: The content add-in with data visualization in Excel.

references.name: Content add-ins
references.description: Content add-ins are surfaces that can be embedded directly into Excel or PowerPoint documents.
